SPELL_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Until end of turn, target creature gets +6/+6 and gains trample, and all creatures able to block it this turn do so.
Fino alla fine del turno, una creatura bersaglio prende +6/+6 e ha travolgere, e tutte le creature in grado di bloccarla in questo turno lo fanno.
Bis zum Ende des Zuges erhält eine Kreatur deiner Wahl +6/+6 und verursacht Trampelschaden. Alle Kreaturen, die diese Kreatur in diesem Zugblocken können, tun dies.
Jusqu'à la fin du tour, la créature ciblée gagne +6/+6 et acquiert le piétinement, et toutes les créatures capables de la bloquer ce tour-ci le font.
Hasta el final del turno, la criatura objetivo obtiene +6/+6 y gana la habilidad de arrollar, y todas las criaturas que puedan bloquearla este turno lo hacen.
クリーチャー１体を対象とする。それはターン終了時まで＋６/＋６の修整を受けるとともにトランプルを得て、このターンにそれをブロックできるすべてのクリーチャーは、それをブロックする。
생물 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 +6/+6을 받고 돌진 능력을 얻는다. 이 턴에 그 생물을 방어할 수 있는 모든 생물은 그 생물을 방어한다.
До конца хода целевое существо получает +6/+6 и Пробивной удар, и все существа, способные блокировать его в этом ходу, делают это.
Até o final do turno, a criatura alvo recebe +6/+6 e ganha atropelar, e todas as criaturas aptas a bloqueá-la neste turno fazem isso.
SPELL_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ALLIED_ONLY, EffectController() )
SPELL_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Power_Add( 6 ) characteristics:Toughness_Add( 6 ) end

local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_TRAMPLE, 1 ) end

local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then local characteristics = target:GetCurrentCharacteristics() characteristics:Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_ALL_CREATURES_MUST_BLOCK_THIS_IF_ABLE, 1 ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: local drawCard = MTG():Interrogate_CardsDrawnThisTurn(EffectController()) if ObjectDC():Get_Int(0) == 1 and drawCard == 1 then ObjectDC():Set_Int( 0, 0 ) return TriggerPlayer() == EffectController() else return false end
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DETERMINATION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) local total = filter:CountStopAt( 1 ) if total == 1 and Object():GetZone() == ZONE_HAND then -- success return 1 else -- fail return 0 end
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if Object():GetZone() == ZONE_HAND then Object():PlayFreeFromAnywhere( EffectController() ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: local card = EffectController():Library_GetNth(0) local source = Object() local drawCard = MTG():Interrogate_CardsDrawnThisTurn(EffectController()) if card ~= nil and source ~= nil then if card == source and drawCard == 0 then return TriggerPlayer() == EffectController() else return false end else return false end
